outputs.output_descr:
Support to Land Tenure and Pastoralism - Global Programme Development. Outputs include:

1. Challenge Papers produced and widely distributed
2. Information disseminated at the Preparatory Committees for the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification and Drought Conference of the Parties VI (UNCCD COP VI)
3. Side events held at the UNCCD COP VI
4. Key fora identified where regional and sub-regional decision makers and experts on the topics covered by the  Global Programmes will be covered
5. Participation in these fora and presentation of the Challenge Papers, organization of the side events to generate interest in and get feedback on and country selection for Global Programmes.
outputs.output_title: SUPPORT TO LAND TENURE AND PAS

project_descr: SUPPORT TO LAND TENURE AND PASTOROLISM GLOBAL PROGRAMME DEVELOPMENT
project_title: Support to Land Tenure and Pastoralism
